definitions.definition: An element ( individual sign or glyph ) of a hieroglyphic writing system .
examples: Hieroglyphs were discovered on the wall inside the temple.
With your handwriting, it's no surprise the Prof can't read your hieroglyphs !

main_definition: An element ( individual sign or glyph ) of a hieroglyphic writing system .
secondary_definitions: ( informal ) Any obscure or baffling symbol .
